== Basic Upgrade Testing ==

=== Lucid ===

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| Testcase
| Expected Result
| Result
| Comment
|-
| Dist Upgrade to 3.6: apt-get install firefox (3.5); update-manager upgrade
| all firefox packages get updated to 3.6 version; launcher in gnome panel still work
| 
| 
|-
| Upgrade to 3.6: apt-get install abrowser (3.5); update-manager upgrade
| all firefox and abrowser packages get updated to 3.6 version; branding stays abrowser
| 
| 
|-
| Verify that translations are imported
| 
| 
| 
|-
| Verify that fonts are still hinted
| fonts should in browser UI are properly hinted (slight); fonts in webpages are properly hinted (if honouring website fonts are disabled)
| 
| 
|-
| verify ubufox homepage
| default homepage experience should still match the one before
| 
| 
| 
|-
| verify ubufox plugin wizard
| you can install flash when visiting video.google.com
| 
| 
|-
| verify ubufox plugin alternative switcher
| user is able to change flash plugin through "Tools -> Manage Content Plugins" when visiting a flash website
| 
| 
|-
| verify translation of main UI
| all UI elements must be translated for primary locales
| 
| 
|-
| verify translation of ubufox
| plugin wizard, plugin alternative wizard, tools-> menu entry and extension addons link must be translated for primary locales
| 
| 
|-
| verify ajax sites after upgrade
| maps.google.com, gmail.com, mail.yahoo.com, etc. still work properly
| 
| 
|-
| verify other important websites
| facebook, twitter, etc.
| 
| 
|}
